Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=3 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>50 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Expression of genes encoding antimicrobial and bradykinin-related peptides in skin of the stream brown frog Rana sakuraii.
Literature.Author: Suzuki H, Iwamuro S, Ohnuma A, Coquet L, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H, Taylor CK, Abel PW, Conlon JM.
